secondary_text.value: Personal sites are full of blogs and loooong posts. I do like the once that takes 2 minutes to read and you learn something new. I would like to use this form to gather my gotchas from my DevRel career primarily to have the record of the solution at one place and maybe it might help others too.

title.value: Kill the process occupying your port

summary.value: Have you encounter with exception like "Address already in use: bind"? If you have been doing web development I have no doubt you have! Now you need to find the bas**rd and kill the process. But how to do that quickly on Windows?

How to transform all items in a List or Array  to another array? If you come from JavaScript world mean map method, in .Net, you would use LINQ and Select method.
But how is that in Java 8?

title.value: Specify folder when uploading Asset via Kontent JS Management SDK

summary.value:
It is great that Kentico Kontent Management REST API allows uploading the assets, but how to upload an asset under a specific folder and how to achieve it via Javascript Management SDK?
Originally this question was asked on StackOverflow.
